医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
供应链评估与管理，优化医药供应链在本次采访中，News Med 与 Joseph P. Ivan 谈论了优化药品供应链的综合评估和管理方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Supply-chain-assessment-and-management-optimizing-pharmaceutical-supply-chains.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Supply-chain-assessment-and-management-optimizing-pharmaceutical-supply-chains.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0dcdebd8-f471-4e12-9644-0aab4e4b3de7 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 09:03:00 -0500 Supply chain assessment and management, optimizing pharmaceutical supply chains
铁失调被认为是长期新冠肺炎的潜在触发因素新研究发现，由于 SARS-CoV-2 感染，血液中的铁含量以及人体调节这种重要营养素的能力出现问题，可能是长期感染新冠病毒的关键触发因素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Iron-dysregulation-identified-as-潜在-trigger-for-long-COVID.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Iron-dysregulation-identified-as-潜在-trigger-for-long-COVID.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed56c5e2-8214-4240-bd06-ee852ac46960 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 09:00:32 -0500 Iron dysregulation identified as potential trigger for long COVID
用 Quorn 代替肉类可降低 10% 的坏胆固醇定期用肉类替代 Quorn 等真菌蛋白可以帮助降低 10% 的坏胆固醇，这与改用地中海饮食或纯素饮食相当。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Substituting-meat-with-Quorn-can-lower-bad-cholesterol-by-1025.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Substituting-meat-with-Quorn-can-lower-bad-cholesterol-by-1025.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1761ca91-cb98-4a3e-bdaa-f7a98cd6cf2a Mon, 04 Mar 2024 08:40:38 -0500 Substituting meat with Quorn can lower bad cholesterol by 10%
遗传风险信息可实现量身定制的乳腺癌筛查赫尔辛基大学研究人员的最新研究结果表明，遗传风险信息可以帮助更有效地为受益最大的女性定制和定位乳腺癌筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Genetic-risk-information-enables-tailored-breast-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Genetic-risk-information-enables-tailored-breast-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7f21a98a-c3f4-410c-8613-4fa5a9bf092e Mon, 04 Mar 2024 08:29:11 -0500 Genetic risk information enables tailored breast cancer screening
人工智能和预测医学：最新进展深度学习 (DL) 在增强组学数据分析预测建模方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/AI-and-predictive-medicine-Recent-advances.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/AI-and-predictive-medicine-Recent-advances.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c4d6b27-45e0-469a-b6f1-4dfe8c4e1f54 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 08:11:00 -0500 AI and predictive medicine: Recent advances
空气污染与心肌梗塞和心源性休克发病率增加有关吗？长期暴露于空气污染（AP）与 ST 段抬高型心肌梗死之间的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Is-air-pollution-linked-with-increased-incidence-of-myocardial-infarction-and-cardiogenic-shock.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Is-air-pollution- Associated-with-increased-incidence-of-myocardial-infarction-and-cardiogenic-shock.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3f64058c-7934-47aa-a23a-0ab178a0eedd Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:39:00 -0500 Is air pollution associated with increased incidence of myocardial infarction and cardiogenic shock?
研究揭示消极态度与拖延、任务延迟之间的联系推迟繁重的任务似乎是一种普遍特征，但新的研究表明，消极态度往往会在一系列情况下决定他们的行为的人更有可能推迟处理手头的任务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Research-uncovers-link- Between-negative-attitudes-and-procrastination-task-delay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Research-uncovers-link- Between-negative-attitudes-and-procrastination-task-delay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a9bf7ff4-3402-4ceb-9c09-2dc77e16eea0 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:31:04 -0500
研究人员发现“泄漏”线粒体如何引发有害炎症研究人员发现，“渗漏”的线粒体（细胞的动力源）如何引发有害炎症，导致狼疮和类风湿性关节炎等疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Researchers-discover-how-leaky-mitochondria-can-drive-harmful-inflammation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/Researchers-discover-how-leaky-mitochondria-can-drive-harmful-inflammation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d25c0d4-f0d7-4edc-818b-ad13dc521c72 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:19:07 -0500 Researchers discover how "leaky" mitochondria can drive harmful inflammation
SARS-CoV-2 感染后认知和记忆功能障碍会持续多久？严重急性呼吸综合征（SARS-CoV-2）感染后是否可以测量认知缺陷。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/How-long-do-cognitive-and-memory-dysfunctions-persist-after-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/How-long-do-cognitive-and-memory-dysfunctions-persist-after-SARS-CoV-2-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea8cdd10-50c9-41db-b74b-28b700299dd0 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:12:00 -0500 How long do cognitive and memory dysfunctions persist after SARS-CoV-2 infection?
加州推动扩大堕胎护理提供者的范围加州为扩大堕胎护理服务范围而做出的努力，使得更多类型的医生能够执行某些堕胎手术——这可能对农村地区的患者尤其有利，但也引起了长期反对扩大堕胎作用的医生团体的担忧。非医生。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/California-pushes-to-expand-the-universe-of-abortion-care-providers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240304/California-pushes-to-expand-the-universe-of-abortion-care-providers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=44b9766a-127e-468b-8f80-f238e55f2fb8 Mon, 04 Mar 2024 06:09:41 -0500 California pushes to expand the universe of abortion care providers
